long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Netflip lets you to rotate your Chrome browser screen 90Â° clockwise or counter clockwise for the comfiest of horizontal binge-watching sessions. Forget sitting up straight or straining and craning your neck to watch while lying down. Netflix just got way more comfortable.
